ygData.subject: Grave robbing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine arrives at the site where he d buried the body of Shadow Wing. he landed his transport pod uphill from it , transformed to wolf and ran to the site.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine arrives at the site where he'd buried the body of Shadow Wing. he
landed his transport pod uphill from it , transformed to wolf and ran to the
site. he was still wary about digging up a grave but knew that it had to be
done if he ever wanted Shadow Wing returned to him. he dug until he found
her remains, the organics were beginning to decompose but there was still
enough to use. he pulled some feathers from the owl head and placed 6them in
a specimen case from the pod.

The wolfbot transformed to bot and opened a link to Veratis."I got the
samples, I'm gonna check out the activity at the Ark, while I'm here be back
soon." his link beeped as the message ended. he knew that he couldn't stay
long, he just wanted to make sure everyone was functional. he started toward
the ark.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>

Subject: Re: Propositions


> ::Ramulus::

got
> a message from Striker, but it was too static to make out. I'm meeting
with
> Prebon soon. I have a feeling its a trap, though, Spears didn't seem like
she
> was herself. Besides, she's been implanted with the chip, and I'm not sure
if
> Prebon removed it. There are some cloaking devices in the equipment room.
A
> few of you could come along in case things get ugly."
